entity.description: Person with whom a business unit has a relationship, such as customer, supplier, and colleague.

attributes.description: Unique identifier of the account with which the contact is associated.

attributes.name: participatesinworkflow
attributes.description: Shows whether the contact participates in workflow rules.

attributes.name: isbackofficecustomer
attributes.description: Select whether the contact exists in a separate accounting or other system, such as Microsoft Dynamics GP or another ERP database, for use in integration processes.

attributes.name: salutation
attributes.description: Type the salutation of the contact to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email messages, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: jobtitle
attributes.description: Type the job title of the contact to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: firstname
attributes.description: Type the contact's first name to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: department
attributes.description: Type the department or business unit where the contact works in the parent company or business.

attributes.name: nickname
attributes.description: Type the contact's nickname.

attributes.name: middlename
attributes.description: Type the contact's middle name or initial to make sure the contact is addressed correctly.

attributes.name: lastname
attributes.description: Type the contact's last name to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: suffix
attributes.description: Type the suffix used in the contact's name, such as Jr. or Sr. to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: yomifirstname
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the contact's first name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the contact.

attributes.name: fullname
attributes.description: Combines and shows the contact's first and last names so that the full name can be displayed in views and reports.

attributes.name: yomimiddlename
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the contact's middle name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the contact.

attributes.name: yomilastname
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the contact's last name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the contact.

attributes.name: anniversary
attributes.description: Enter the date of the contact's wedding or service anniversary for use in customer gift programs or other communications.

attributes.name: birthdate
attributes.description: Enter the contact's birthday for use in customer gift programs or other communications.

attributes.name: governmentid
attributes.description: Type the passport number or other government ID for the contact for use in documents or reports.

attributes.name: yomifullname
attributes.description: Shows the combined Yomi first and last names of the contact so that the full phonetic name can be displayed in views and reports.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the contact, such as an excerpt from the company's website.

attributes.name: employeeid
attributes.description: Type the employee ID or number for the contact for reference in orders, service cases, or other communications with the contact's organization.

attributes.name: gendercode
attributes.description: Select the contact's gender to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

constrainedList.name: contact_gendercode
constrainedList.description: Gender of the contact.

attributes.name: annualincome
attributes.description: Type the contact's annual income for use in profiling and financial analysis.

attributes.name: haschildrencode
attributes.description: Select whether the contact has any children for reference in follow-up phone calls and other communications.

constrainedList.name: contact_haschildrencode

attributes.name: educationcode

attributes.name: websiteurl
attributes.description: Type the contact's professional or personal website or blog URL.

attributes.description: Type the name of the contact's assistant.

attributes.description: Type the secondary email address for the contact.

attributes.description: Type the phone number for the contact's assistant.

attributes.name: emailaddress3
attributes.description: Type an alternate email address for the contact.

attributes.name: donotphone
attributes.description: Select whether the contact accepts phone calls. If Do Not Allow is selected, the contact will be excluded from any phone call activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: managername
attributes.description: Type the name of the contact's manager for use in escalating issues or other follow-up communications with the contact.

attributes.name: managerphone
attributes.description: Type the phone number for the contact's manager.

attributes.name: donotfax
attributes.description: Select whether the contact allows faxes. If Do Not Allow is selected, the contact will be excluded from any fax activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: donotemail
attributes.description: Select whether the contact allows direct email sent from Microsoft Dynamics 365. If Do Not Allow is selected, Microsoft Dynamics 365 will not send the email.

attributes.name: donotpostalmail
attributes.description: Select whether the contact allows direct mail. If Do Not Allow is selected, the contact will be excluded from letter activities distributed in marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: donotbulkemail
attributes.description: Select whether the contact accepts bulk email sent through marketing campaigns or quick campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the contact can be added to marketing lists, but will be excluded from the email.

attributes.name: donotbulkpostalmail
attributes.description: Select whether the contact accepts bulk postal mail sent through marketing campaigns or quick campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the contact can be added to marketing lists, but will be excluded from the letters.

attributes.name: accountrolecode
attributes.description: Select the contact's role within the company or sales process, such as decision maker, employee, or influencer.

attributes.description: Select a region or territory for the contact for use in segmentation and analysis.

attributes.name: creditlimit
attributes.description: Type the credit limit of the contact for reference when you address invoice and accounting issues with the customer.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: creditonhold
attributes.description: Select whether the contact is on a credit hold, for reference when addressing invoice and accounting issues.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: overriddencreatedon
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: exchangerate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.description: Shows the Annual Income field converted to the system's default base currency. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.

attributes.name: creditlimit_base
attributes.description: Shows the Credit Limit field converted to the system's default base currency for reporting purposes. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.

attributes.name: aging60_base
attributes.description: Shows the Aging 60 field converted to the system's default base currency. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.

attributes.description: Shows the Aging 30 field converted to the system's default base currency. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the Currencies area.
